amendment.description: Amendment sought to decrease the amount the Federal Government subsidizes Amtrak by $446,900,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 43 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the funding for AMTRAK Capitol by $446.9 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A065) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 250 (Roll no. 79).
